attributes.action: Listen to the British people and to stop immigration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are an overcrowded country, immigration has to stop, its out of control, its a strain on resources, listen to the british people and bring back our britain again, instead of looking at the wrong figures and data.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
